definition: Qing or Ch'ing dynasty of imperial China (1644-1911)/surname Qing
clear/distinct/quiet/just and honest/pure/to settle or clear up/to clean up or purge
handsome/refined/elegant/graceful/superior/show (loanword)/CL:場|场[chang2]/(literary) to grow/to bloom/(of crops) to produce ears

sentences.english: Many women dream of a sleek and refined face contour.
sentences.chinese: 拥有一张纤细清秀的瓜子脸是众多女士的梦想。
她的清秀美丽使他倾倒。

sentences.english: Her face is too thin; her complexion has no brilliancy; and her features are not at all handsome.
sentences.chinese: 她的脸太瘦，皮肤没有光泽，眉目也不清秀。

sentences.english: On the screen appeared a girl of comely face.
sentences.chinese: 屏幕上出现了一个清秀的女孩的脸。

sentences.english: Her brother is a tall good-looking young man.
sentences.chinese: 她的哥哥是一位眉目清秀的年轻男士。

sentences.english: The whole mountain is a fine elegant park-style cemetery.
sentences.chinese: 整个山头是一座幽雅清秀的公园式陵园。

sentences.english: He was ruddy, with a fine appearance and handsome features.
sentences.chinese: 他面色光红，双目清秀，容貌俊美。

sentences.english: The girl has a good figure and comely appearance.
sentences.chinese: 这个姑娘身材佼好，面容清秀。

sentences.english: White than green high, fancy handsome honest carved Xu Xian printing factory.
sentences.chinese: 白道行比青高，看中了清秀老实的印刷工场刻工许仙。

definition: lucid and elegant/quiet and exquisite/clear and attractive style
to have bright eyes and white teeth
